name: character-local-example
description: Express 4.x app using Character for identity with username and password

scripts.build-watch:ext: concurrently "cd ../character && npm run build-watch" "cd ../character-authentication && npm run build-watch" "cd ../character-authenticator && npm run build-watch" "cd ../character-local && npm run build-watch"
scripts.link:ext: cd ../character && npm link && cd ../character-authentication && npm link && cd ../character-authenticator && npm link && cd ../character-local && npm link && npm link character-authenticator

author: Faraz Syed <hello@farazsyed.com>
